name: The Chicken Nest Escape
description:
Can you keep the adorable chickens from escaping the nest? To Move a chicken Drag them with your finger. Bonk the chickens to talk to them in the start menu. Chicken Nest Escape is a fun game made by Thor. Summer 2020

Update: Halloween exclusive level and More talkative menu chickens

Update: Easter came, and so did many rainbow chickens! The rainbow chickens have followers , but don't worry about their escape.

The original publication can be found at https://simmer.io/@A_Thor/chicken-nest-escape ,This is just a re upload of an old game
